title: What is the history of the small road off Car. Bch Rd. leading into the Seabreeze community named Salient Point? Been there as long as I can remember...Who, when...and why? Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2015/09/how-did-the-road-salient-point-get-its-name/
